name: GetMiroMindmapNode
description:
Retrieve details about a specific mind map node on a Miro board.

Use this tool to get information about a particular node within a mind map on a Miro board. Useful for understanding node details or extracting specific data related to mind map elements.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the Miro board to retrieve a mind map node from.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the board from which you want to retrieve a mind map node.

parameters.name: mindmap_node_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the mind map node to retrieve from the board.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier (ID) of the mind map node that you want to retrieve.
